biotools.summary: BActeriocin GEnome mining tooL (BAGEL) identifies putative bacteriocin ORFs (antimicrobial peptides)  based on a database containing information about known bacteriocins and adjacent genes involved in bacteriocin activity.

bioschemas.name: BAGEL
